oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-02-14 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 14, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer - although Ferlin Husky was advertised as the host for this week on the previous show), guest performers the Carlisles, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1010th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Archie Campbell; Carlisles; Tommy Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- Last Night At A Party (Faron Young) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces the Carlisles -- I Don't Want To Run (Carlisles) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Tommy Jackson -- Old Joe Clark (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Faron Young talks -- When I've Learned (Faron Young)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Campbell, Archie; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Young, Faron; Carlisles (Musical group); Carlisle, Bill; Sills, Dottie; Collins, Honey Bear
